actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend certain benefits presently provided to veterans who are blind as a result of service-connected disability to veterans who are blind as a result of nonservice-connected disability but who have other service-connected disabilities rated as total.

summary.text: Extends those benefits presently provided to veterans who are blind as a result of service-connected disability to veterans who are blind as a result of non-service-connected disability but who have other service-connected disabilities rated as total. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 360, 614, 801, 1901)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend certain benefits presently provided to veterans who are blind as a result of service-connected disability to veterans who are blind as a result of nonservice-connected disability but who have other service-connected disabilities rated as total.
